text.div:
Generated Narrative: PlanDefinition

Resource PlanDefinition "IMMZ.DT.01.BCG"

url: http://fhir.org/guides/who/smart-immunization/PlanDefinition/IMMZ.DT.01.BCG

version: 0.1.0

name: IMMZ.DT.01.BCG

title: IMMZ.DT.01.BCG

status: draft

date: 2023-03-31 14:38:57+0000

publisher: World Health Organization (WHO)

description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give BCG vaccine as soon as possible after birth

jurisdiction: Global (Whole world) (m49.htm#001)

library: IMMZDT01

action

title: Immunize Patient for BCG - TST-negative

description: Provide BCG immunizations – using the "BCG vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (1 dose scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"TST Test Result" = "TST-negative"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for BCG

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"High incidence of TB and/or high leprosy burden" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for BCG

definition: IMMZ.DT.01.BCG.01

action

title: Immunize Patient for BCG - IGRA-negative

description: Provide BCG immunizations – using the "BCG vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (1 dose scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"IGRA Test Result" = "IGRA-negative"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for BCG

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"High incidence of TB and/or high leprosy burden" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for BCG

definition: IMMZ.DT.01.BCG.02

action

title: Immunize Patient for BCG - No Doses

description: Provide BCG immunizations – using the "BCG vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (1 dose scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"BCG vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for BCG

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"High incidence of TB and/or high leprosy burden" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for BCG

definition: IMMZ.DT.01.BCG.03

action

title: Immunize Patient for BCG - History Unknown

description: Provide BCG immunizations – using the "BCG vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (1 dose scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"BCG vaccine immunization history" = "Unknown"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for BCG

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"High incidence of TB and/or high leprosy burden" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for BCG

definition: IMMZ.DT.01.BCG.04

action

title: Immunize Patient for BCG - No Doses and HIV Status Positive and immunicologically stable

description: Provide BCG immunizations – using the "BCG vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (1 dose scheme) if CD4% >25% for children aged <5 years or CD4 count ≥200 if aged >5 years

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"BCG vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for BCG

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"HIV Status" = "Positive"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for BCG

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"CD4%" >"25%"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for BCG

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Years" < 5text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for BCG

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"High incidence of TB and/or high leprosy burden" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for BCG

definition: IMMZ.DT.01.BCG.05
